import React, { useState } from 'react' import cloudy from "./../assets/Cloudy.jpg" import axios from 'axios' const Home = () => { const [location, setlocation] = useState('') const [weatherDetails, setWeatherDetails] = useState({}) const handleSearch = async (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() await axios.get(`api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${location}&APPID=${process.env.WEATHER_API_KEY}`).then((response)=>{ console.log(response) }) } return (
{ setlocation(e.target.value) }} />

) } export default Home
